name.baseName: Shearing, crushing, screening, granulation ; Biomass densified forming fuel ; Forest wood, straw, peanut shell, rice husk, corn cob, sawdust, waste scrap and all other biomass raw materials ; Extrusion molding ; All sizes; NESPS2
剪切、破碎、筛分、造粒 ; 生物质致密成型燃料 ; 林木、秸秆、花生壳、稻壳、玉米芯、锯末、废物废料等所有生物质原料 ; 挤压成型 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Biomass briquette fuelisCyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Biomass briquette fuelisCyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该生物质致密化工艺旨在通过剪切、破碎、筛分和造粒，将林木、秸秆、花生壳、稻壳、玉米芯、锯末和各种废物废料等原料转化为致密成型燃料。所得产品适用于供热和发电等可再生能源的应用。配备了旋风除尘和布袋过滤等末端管理技术，该工艺适合需要高效颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）污染控制的环境，如空气质量法规严格的工业场所。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2542文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为92，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是旋风除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
源文件中描述为为生物质致密成型燃料，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
